title: #360: The Death Of The Black Panther And The Alien Occult Apocalypse with Isaac Weishaupt and Chris Roberts
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome Occult expert Isaac Weishaupt and Gematria expert Chris Roberts back to the show to discuss the "unexpected" passing of the Black Panther's Chadwick Boseman and the Hollywood and Washington DC's Occults worship for an Alien Apocalypse! Thank you so much for your support.

Live Shows:
Sept 5th: Tin Foil Hat Live at the Comedy Store with Special Guest the Higher Chats' Greg Carlwood!

Appleton Wisconsin Sept 10th-12th: Headlining the Skyline Comedy Club:
www.skylinecomedy.com/events/40525

Raleigh North Carolina: Sept 24-26 Goodnight Comedy Club:
www.goodnightscomedy.com/

St. Louis, Missouri: Oct 1st-3rd: Headlining the St. Louis Helium Comedy Club:
st-louis.heliumcomedy.com
